descriptionlist.description: Install emojiport and iOS 12.1 emojis in one package! Must have the emojiport repo installed, if you don't already, scroll down and add it. I Used elements of the source of minimal hosts blocker to make this project. Open sourced on github.
DOES NOT WORK ON iOS 10.x KPPLESS JAILBREAKS, AND WILL BREAK CYDIA ON MERIDAN.

changelog.change: Should save ~50 mb of storage compared to 1.0.5.
